Simulate a dataset consisting of expression and location information with concentric circular structure

Source: R/simulation.R
simulateDataset.Rd

Simulate a dataset consisting of expression and location information with concentric circular structure

simulateDataset(
  n_buds = 3,
  n_genes = 100,
  n_deg = c(10, 5, 7),
  de_shift = c(3, 4, 2),
  de_dropout = c(0.8, 0.9, 0.7),
  n_cells = c(250, 150, 100),
  n_circles = c(3, 3, 3),
  n_thickness = list(c(3, 1, 3), c(2, 1, 4), c(2, 2, 2)),
  radius_init = c(5, 3, 3),
  radius_increment = c(4, 3, 3),
  x_stretch = c(1.1, 1, 1),
  y_stretch = c(0.9, 1.1, 1),
  offset_x = c(0, 50, 20),
  offset_y = c(0, 40, 35),
  skew = c(0, 0, 0.5),
  seed = 1000
)

Arguments

n_buds

Number of rings

n_genes

Number of genes

n_deg

Number of de genes per bud

de_shift

Mean shift for de genes per bud

de_dropout

Fraction of cells where gene is de per bud

n_cells

Number of cells per bud

n_circles

Number of circles per bud

n_thickness

Thickness of each circle per bud

radius_init

Initial radius of each bud

radius_increment

Radius increment per bud

x_stretch

Amount of stretching in the x-direction per bud

y_stretch

Amount of stretching in the y-direction per bud

offset_x

Offset to shift x center of bud

offset_y

Offset to shift y center of bud

skew

Rotation of bud

seed

Seed for sampling

Value

List of expression, locations, and metadata

Examples

data <- simulateDataset()
